Name: Shadow of Egypt
About the game: Shadow of Egypt - is an adventurous 3D shooter with surviving and hardcore elements where you will fight with ancient Egyptian evil. The main idea is cleaning an enormous pyramid from various enemies. There are three levels of different difficulty. Collect ammos, watch your health, look for guns, kill mummies. This game will be unforgettable for you! KEY FEATURES: - Big levels. - Dynamic and hardcore gameplay. - A wide variety of weapons. - Exciting atmosphere.
